rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg001
rows.name:
Hey, look at that! Have you ever seen
such a beautiful sunset?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg002
rows.name: I knew it would be worth coming here!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg003
rows.name:
It's one of those things that stays in
your mind forever after you've seen it.
It's like I can't take my eyes off it.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg005
rows.name: Oh...what's this?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg006
rows.name: Suddenly the skies don't seem so...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg007
rows.name:
Ah. Well. You know, it's funny, but
this seems to happen to me a lot.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg008
rows.name:
Nice, dry days start to pour with
rain, just like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg009
rows.name:
Or sometimes, it's blizzards, or great
big hailstones. I think the clouds
might like to follow me around.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg010
rows.name:
But maybe that's actually a talent!
It's like I get to see two different views
for the price of one!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg011
rows.name: Hmmm... How should I answer...?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg012
rows.name:
You really know how to look on the
bright side, Kasane.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg013
rows.name:
Maybe you should get that thing on
your back seen to? By, uh, an exorcist?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg014
rows.name: Hmmm... How should I answer...?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg015
rows.name: You're such a sunshiney soul, Kasane.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg016
rows.name:
Are you sure that creepy thing on your
back isn't tainting your luck?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg017
rows.name: Hmmm... How should I answer...?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg018
rows.name:
You really know how to sustain your
own morale, Kasane.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg019
rows.name:
Have you ever considered the notion
that thing on your back may be cursed?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg020
rows.name: Hmmm... How should I answer...?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg021
rows.name:
Kasane, you always look on the bright
side. You're my kind of gal.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg022
rows.name:
Have you ever thought that gewgaw on
your back might be blighting your luck?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg023
rows.name:
Yes, it's true! I can always see the silver
lining of every cloud!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg024
rows.name:
Even when the beautiful sunset we
came all this way to see gets blocked
out by rain...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg025
rows.name:
Even when that good luck charm
I bought at the store snapped
clean in half the next day...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg026
rows.name:
I always keep looking forward!
It's just how I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg027
rows.name:
As long as you always stay strong and
keep your chin up, happiness will come
your way! That's what I believe!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg028
rows.name:
And even if terrible misfortunes
befall my Driver, I'm sure if I stay
cheerful it'll keep their spirits up!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg029
rows.name: That's what a good Blade does, right?!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg030
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg031
rows.name: You don't think this mask is cute?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg032
rows.name: ...But I thought it was really charming...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg033
rows.name:
This is the sort of face that brings luck!
It couldn't possibly be cursed!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg034
rows.name:
You say that, but...
Sometimes when I see you in battle,
even I get kind of scared...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg035
rows.name:
When you put that mask on, you start
attacking the enemy without mercy!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg036
rows.name:
Seriously, I reckon you should get
that thing looked at.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg037
rows.name:
Whenever you put it on in battle, it's
like you're a whole different person.
A really...violent person.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg038
rows.name:
Oh, dear... How do I say this?
I suppose you wouldn't necessarily
notice it yourself, but, well...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg039
rows.name:
There's something...not quite normal
about the way you fight. When you put
that mask on, you go a little berserk.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg040
rows.name:
Uhhh, you say that, but that thing gives
off a seriously evil aura in battle!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg041
rows.name:
When you put that mask on and start
attacking enemies, it's like you're in
some kind of blood frenzy.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg042
rows.name: Ahahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg043
rows.name:
Don't be silly. I would never
do anything like that!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg045
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg046
rows.name:
I mean, when I'm on the battlefield,
it's like I'm in a trance sometimes.
I don't remember much afterwards.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg047
rows.name:
I guess I must be really good at
focusing on the job!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg048
rows.name:
It takes a lot of attention looking out
for you guys, you know!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg049
rows.name: I get really into it!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg051
rows.name:
Well, this rain's really gotten worse.
It's sad to leave such a beautiful place,
but we'd better get moving.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg052
rows.name:
I thought we had a pretty great
time here today, didn't you?
I really like it when we all hang out!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg054
rows.name:
Sometimes I think I'm the luckiest
Blade alive.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg055
rows.name:
I've got such a great Driver, and
all these wonderful companions!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg056
rows.name:
Let's try and be the happiest that we
can. Then we can spread that
happiness over the whole world!
